name: rasstislav/silverstripe-idsk
description: ID-SK Frontend – Jednotný dizajn manuál elektronických služieb a webových sídiel.

suggest.silverstripe/blog: The blog module allows you to post blogs on your SilverStripe.
suggest.jonom/focuspoint: Smarter automatic image cropping for SilverStripe.
suggest.silverstripe/userforms: UserForms enables CMS users to create dynamic forms via a drag and drop interface and without getting involved in any PHP code.
suggest.undefinedoffset/silverstripe-nocaptcha: A spam protector and form field using Google's reCAPTCHA v2 or optionally a foundation v3 implementation
suggest.fromholdio/silverstripe-fulltext-filters: This module adds three fulltext SearchFilters to your SilverStripe project.
